contexts.context: Dear Stella: <mark>Friday</mark> or Saturday fine,except we dine with the Pfarrer...
...your card. Cant get im to Vienna before <mark>Friday</mark>, but do come and see us either on...
...scowl, venomous and vindictive, a flat frowning <mark>Friday</mark> face, horrid as a hang-over and mean as...
...Vienna this coming week on Monday,  Wednesday and <mark>Friday</mark>. Will try to call you to-morrow to...
